attributes.additional_details: For our Humanities Controlled Assessment, we have been asked to organise a 'Stop HS2 campaign' so our group decided to hand out posters and leaflets concerning HS2, also on the posters/leaflets, there will be website details about our petition.

rejection.details: The e-petition website is for people who wish to gather signatures supporting a campaign.  The description for your petition doesn't make the case for your campaign; it merely states why you're setting it up.  You may wish to resubmit your e-petition, making clear your arguments against HS2 (though you may wish also to repeat your point about how you came to be starting this petition).
